message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $102 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $108. I think this is a fair price for the product.
Considering your last offer, I think $106 would be a reasonable price for the product.
I'm still a bit above your last offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $109. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I think $107 would be a fair price.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
